## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                     | Type                                                             | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The color palette of the alert. | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
